tutorial.speak:
Now let's schedule some lessons. Click on your classroom to open it.
Click Add First Schedule to create your first lesson schedule.
Select the date, Program, Study, Lesson, and Venue you would like to schedule. If you need to browse available lessons, visit lessons dot church and explore the studies, then come back here to set your schedule. Click Save when ready.
Your first lesson is now scheduled. Click Add Schedule to add more lessons.
Notice that the system automatically sets the next week and selects the next lesson in the series. This makes it super easy to schedule an entire series within minutes. Just verify the details and click Save.
You now have multiple lessons scheduled. Continue adding lessons to build out your full schedule.
